data.message:
We openly defended your drug addiction, the hate from the media, hate from our friends for years! You were my favorite artist but what you just said about @realdonaldtrump and his supporters crossed my fake piss line in the sand! So you can go down in flames with the rest of the leftist liberal elites that none of of thought you were apart of!. 
So fuck you and the whore you crawled out of! 
Pussy!
